Job Description:
Demonstrated expertise and track record in the area of Software Architecture both fronted backend specifically in constructing architectures using available open source components (experience working on both front end and backend software using languages and frameworks (Java/ Python,  AngularJS,  React,  Node.js/ Express.js,  etc..)
• Demonstrated expertise in Big Data platforms: SQL and noSQL databases 
• Knowledge in API development for web/ mobile use 
• An understanding of performance engineering especially storage,  retrieval,  analysis of large amounts of data
